admin_templates.template:
<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_download_add_on_installupgrade}: {$addOn.title}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase hex_download_add_on_installupgrade}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/edit', $addOn}">{$addOn.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require css="delete_confirmation.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/download', $addOn}" class="deleteConfirmForm formOverlay">
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase version_string}:" name="version_string" value="{$addOn.version_string}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase this_string_will_be_displayed_to_end_user}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase hex_download_add_on_installupgrade}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_edit_url_installupgrade}: {$addOn.title}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/save-url', $addOn}" upload="true"> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase hex_upgrade_url_installupgrade}:" name="install_upgrade_filename" value="{$addOn.install_upgrade_filename}" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase hex_edit_url_installupgrade}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

• {xen:phrase hex_rebuild_add_on_installupgrade}
  • {xen:phrase hex_download_add_on_installupgrade}
{xen:phrase error}!

<script type="text/javascript">
<!--
$(function()
{
	$('#UninstallAddOns').click(function(e)
	{
		if ($('#UpgradeForm').is(':visible')) {
			return false;
		}
			
		$('label.selectListItem, #UninstallForm, #UninstallHint').toggle();
		
		$('.listItem .toggler, .listItem .delete, .togglerAll, .toolsCtrl').toggle();
		
		if ($('#UninstallForm').is(':visible')) {
			$('#UpgradeAddOns').addClass('disabled');
		} else {
			$('#UpgradeAddOns').removeClass('disabled');
		}
		
		return false;
	});
	
	$('#UninstallForm').submit(function(e)
	{
		var $UninstallForm= $('#UninstallForm');
		
		$UninstallForm.find('input:hidden.temp').remove();
		
		$('.FilterList').find('.selectListItem > input:checkbox').each(function()
		{
			if (this.checked && this.name == 'addOnId[]')
			{
				$UninstallForm.append('<input type="hidden" class="temp" name="addon_ids[]" value="' + this.value + '" />');
			}
		});
		
		return true;
	});
	
	$('#UpgradeAddOns').click(function(e)
	{
		if ($('#UninstallForm').is(':visible')) {
			return false;
		}
		
		$('label.selectListItem, #UpgradeForm, #UpgradeHint').toggle();
		
		$('.listItem .toggler, .listItem .delete, .togglerAll, .toolsCtrl').toggle();
		
		$("label.selectListItem input").attr("checked", false);
		
		if ($('#UpgradeForm').is(':visible')) {
			$('#UninstallAddOns').addClass('disabled');
			$('label.selectListItem input').attr("disabled", true);
			$('li.canUpgrade label.selectListItem input').removeAttr("disabled");
		} else {
			$('#UninstallAddOns').removeClass('disabled');
			$('label.selectListItem input').removeAttr("disabled");
		}
		
		return false;
	});
	
	$('#UpgradeForm').submit(function(e)
	{
		var $UpgradeForm= $('#UpgradeForm');
		
		$UpgradeForm.find('input:hidden.temp').remove();
		
		$('.FilterList').find('.selectListItem > input:checkbox').each(function()
		{
			if (this.checked && this.name == 'addOnId[]')
			{
				$UpgradeForm.append('<input type="hidden" class="temp" name="addon_ids[]" value="' + this.value + '" />');
			}
		});
		
		return true;
	});
});
//-->
</script>

<style type="text/css">
<!--
.FilterList .selectListItem,
#UninstallHint,
#UninstallForm,
#UpgradeHint,
#UpgradeForm
{
	display: none;
}
-->
</style>

<xen:form class="section" id="UninstallForm" action="{xen:adminlink add-ons/delete}">
	<input type="submit" class="button" value="{xen:phrase hex_uninstall_addons_installupgrade}" />
	
	<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" />
</xen:form>

<xen:form class="section" id="UpgradeForm" action="{xen:adminlink add-ons/upgrade}">
	<input type="submit" class="button" value="{xen:phrase hex_upgrade_addons_installupgrade}" />
	
	<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:if $addOn, {xen:phrase upgrade_add_on}, {xen:phrase install_new_add_on}}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:if $addOn, {xen:adminlink 'add-ons/upgrade', $addOn}, {xen:adminlink 'add-ons/install'}}" autocomplete="off"> <xen:include template="hex_login_error_panel_helper_installupgrade" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase install_add_on}" /> <input type="hidden" name="status" value="{$status}" /> <xen:if is="{$status} == 401"> <input type="hidden" name="auth_type" value="{$auth_type}" /> </xen:if> <input type="hidden" name="original_server_file" value="{$original_server_file}" /> <input type="hidden" name="server_file" value="{$server_file}" /> <input type="hidden" name="redirect" value="{$redirect}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase hex_stored_credentials_installupgrade}
{xen:phrase hex_to_store_encrypted_passwords_log_out_installupgrade}
{xen:phrase hex_url_installupgrade} {xen:phrase user_name} {xen:phrase password} {xen:phrase hex_encrypted_installupgrade}  
{$storedCredential.host}{$storedCredential.path} {$storedCredential.username} ******** {xen:if '{$storedCredential.user_id}', {xen:phrase yes}, {xen:phrase no}} {xen:phrase edit} {xen:phrase delete}
{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={xen:count $storedCredentials}', 'total={xen:count $storedCredentials}'}
{xen:phrase no_results_found}

{xen:phrase hex_confirm_deletion_of_stored_credentials_installupgrade}: {$credential.host}{$credential.path} {xen:phrase hex_confirm_deletion_of_stored_credentials_installupgrade}

{xen:phrase hex_please_confirm_want_to_delete_stored_credentials_installupgrade}:

{$credential.host}{$credential.path}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_stored_credentials_installupgrade}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/stored-credentials-save'}" autocomplete="off"> <input style="display:none" type="text" name="fakeusernameremembered"/> <input style="display:none" type="password" name="fakepasswordremembered"/>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase hex_host_name_installupgrade}:" name="host" value="{$credential.host}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase hex_path_installupgrade}:" name="path" value="{$credential.path}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase user_name}:" name="username" value="{$credential.username}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase password}:" name="password" type="password" value="{$credential.password}" />
<xen:if is="{$canEncrypt}"> <xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="encrypt" selected="true" label="{xen:phrase hex_encrypt_login_credentials_installupgrade}" /> </xen:checkboxunit> </xen:if>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase save_changes}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase hex_dismiss_broadcast_installupgrade}

{xen:phrase hex_are_you_sure_you_want_to_dismiss_broadcast_installupgrade}
{xen:raw $broadcast.message} {xen:phrase hex_last_update_installupgrade}: {xen:datetime $broadcast.time} {xen:phrase hex_dismiss_broadcast_installupgrade}

<xen:title>{xen:if $addOnId, {xen:phrase upgrade_add_on}, {xen:phrase install_new_add_on}}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:if $addOnId, {xen:adminlink 'add-ons/upgrade'}, {xen:adminlink 'add-ons/install'}}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_hotspots_hotspots}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink hotspots/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="node_id" value="{$node_id}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite" value="{$overwrite}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_language}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink languages/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="parent_language_id" value="{$parentLanguageId}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_language_id" value="{$overwriteLanguageId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_moderators_moderators}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink moderators/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="overwrite" value="{$overwrite}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_object_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink object-fields/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="display_group" value="{$displayGroup}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_field_id" value="{$overwriteFieldId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_post_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink post-fields/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="display_group" value="{$displayGroup}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_field_id" value="{$overwriteFieldId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink resource-fields/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="display_group" value="{$displayGroup}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_field_id" value="{$overwriteFieldId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="overwrite" value="{$overwrite}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink social-forum-fields/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="display_group" value="{$displayGroup}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_field_id" value="{$overwriteFieldId}">

<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink user-fields/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="display_group" value="{$displayGroup}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_field_id" value="{$overwriteFieldId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink user-groups/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_user_group_id" value="{$overwriteUserGroupId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_user_upgrade_userupgrades}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink user-upgrades/import}">
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase hex_xml_to_import_installupgrade}:" name="server_file"> <xen:foreach loop="$choices" value="$choice"> <xen:option label="{$choice.1}" value="{$choice.0}" hint="{$choice.0}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="target" value="{$target}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite_user_upgrade_id" value="{$overwriteUserUpgradeId}">
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:if $addOnId, {xen:phrase upgrade_add_on}, {xen:phrase install_new_add_on}}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:if $addOnId, {xen:adminlink 'add-ons/upgrade'}, {xen:adminlink 'add-ons/install'}}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_language}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink languages/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_object_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink object-fields/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_post_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink post-fields/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_resource_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink resource-fields/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_smilies_smilieimporter}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink smilies/import-xml}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_social_forum_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink social-forum-fields/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_style}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink styles/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_thread_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink thread-fields/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_trophies_trophies}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink trophies/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase import_user_field}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink user-fields/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_user_group_usergroups}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink user-groups/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_user_upgrade_userupgrades}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink user-upgrades/import}">
<xen:include template="hex_helper_files_skipped_installupgrade" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_upgrade_xenforo_installupgrade}</xen:title>
<xen:if is="{$versions}"> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'upgrade/get-download-version'}"> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase hex_version_installupgrade}:" name="download_version_id"> <xen:foreach loop="{$versions}" key="{$versionId}" value="{$version}"> <xen:option value="{$versionId}" selected="{$version.selected}">{$version.title}</xen:option> </xen:foreach> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase hex_upgrade_xenforo_installupgrade}" />
<input type="hidden" name="rebuild" value="{$rebuild}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form> <xen:else /> {xen:phrase hex_there_are_no_updated_versions_installupgrade} </xen:if>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_upgrade_xenforo_installupgrade}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'upgrade/get-license-key'}"> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase hex_license_installupgrade}:" name="license_key"> <xen:foreach loop="{$licenses}" key="{$licenseKey}" value="{$license}"> <xen:option value="{$licenseKey}" selected="{$license.selected}">{$license.title}</xen:option> </xen:foreach> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase hex_upgrade_xenforo_installupgrade}" />
<input type="hidden" name="rebuild" value="{$rebuild}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase please_correct_following_errors}:

  1. {xen:raw $error}
    2.
{xen:phrase hex_files_were_skipped_installupgrade}

{xen:phrase hex_skipped_files_installupgrade}

    {$file}

{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={xen:count $skippedFiles}', 'total={xen:count $skippedFiles}'}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase hex_import_hotspots_hotspots}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'hotspots/import'}" autocomplete="off"> <xen:include template="hex_login_error_panel_helper_installupgrade" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" />
<input type="hidden" name="node_id" value="{$nodeId}"> <input type="hidden" name="overwrite" value="{$overwrite}">
<input type="hidden" name="status" value="{$status}" /> <xen:if is="{$status} == 401"> <input type="hidden" name="auth_type" value="{$auth_type}" /> </xen:if> <input type="hidden" name="server_file" value="{$server_file}" /> <input type="hidden" name="redirect" value="{$redirect}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_upload">{xen:phrase import_from_uploaded_file}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="file" name="upload[]" id="ctrl_upload" multiple="multiple" /> </dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_server_file">{xen:phrase hex_import_from_file_on_server_installupgrade}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="server_file" class="textCtrl" id="ctrl_server_file" /> </dd> </dl>

{xen:phrase hex_install_multiple_add_ons_installupgrade} + {xen:phrase install_add_on} + {xen:phrase create_add_on}

{xen:phrase add_ons}

    {xen:calc '{$addOnCount} + 1'}
    {xen:phrase hex_available_versions_elipses_installupgrade}

    {xen:phrase hex_available_versions_elipses_installupgrade}

{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={$addOnCount}', 'total={xen:count $directoryAddOns}'}

{xen:phrase hex_there_are_no_addons_to_install_or_upgrade_installupgrade}

<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

modification.description: Adds uninstall toggle to add-on list.
modification.replace: {xen:phrase hex_uninstall_addons_installupgrade} {xen:phrase hex_upgrade_addons_installupgrade} ${0}

modification.description: Adds select checkboxes to add-on list.
modification.replace: <xen:listitem selectable="true" selectname="addOnId[]" class="{xen:if {$addOn.canUpgrade}, 'canUpgrade'}"

modification.description: Adds extra links to controls menu in add-on list.
Adds the error control to the add-on list
modification.replace: <xen:html> <xen:include template="hex_addon_list_error_control_installupgrade" /> </xen:html> $0

modification.description: Adds outdated add-on count to 'Home' tab.
modification.replace: ${1} {$outdatedAddOnCount}${2} ${1}${2}

modification.description: Adds broadcast and active members to home.
modification.replace: ${0} {xen:phrase hex_active_members_installupgrade}: {xen:number $users.active}

modification.description: Adds 'install from file on server' option to hotspot import.
modification.replace: <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_upload">{xen:phrase hex_import_from_uploaded_file_installupgrade}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="file" name="upload[]" id="ctrl_upload" multiple="multiple"> </dd> </dl> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase hex_import_from_file_on_server_installupgrade}:" name="server_file" inputclass="{xen:if {$xenOptions.hex_installUpgrade_autoCompleteServerFile}, 'AutoComplete AcSingle'}" data-acurl="{xen:adminlink upgrade/search-filename}" />

modification.description: Adds the multiple-upload box to add-on install.
modification.replace: <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_upload_file">{xen:phrase install_from_uploaded_file}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="file" name="upload_file[]" id="ctrl_upload_file" multiple="multiple"> </dd> </dl> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase hex_install_from_url_file_on_server_installupgrade}:" name="server_file" inputclass="{xen:if {$xenOptions.hex_installUpgrade_autoCompleteServerFile}, 'AutoComplete AcSingle'}" data-acurl="{xen:adminlink add-ons/search-filename}" />

phrases.phrase: The Add-on {addOn} could not check for updates because it received a {errorNo} error during the HTTP request. Update checking for this add-on will be disabled until you edit the URL.
The Add-on {addOn} could not check for updates because you did not link to a resource manager page
All add-ons are up to date.
Are you sure you want to dismiss this broadcast?
Unable to copy files. Try adding/checking your FTP login details.
If selected, the username and password entered will be stored unencrypted in the database and used for all future download requests from this website.
The license token is invalid or has changed. Please try upgrading again and select a valid license.
No license validation token found. Please enter a token here.
No resource can be found at the specified URL.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following stored credentials
There are no updated versions available for this license.
To store encrypted passwords, log out of the Admin Control Panel and log back in to generate a new encryption key.
Unable to create temporary directory. Please check your server permissions.
Options for the [#] Install and Upgrade add-on.
Allow files to be extracted over FTP.
Allow hexthemes.com to broadcast messages on home screen

Enabling this option will allow hexthemes.com to show useful messages on your home screen. These will be updated whenever this add-on makes a request to the hexthemes.com servers. Broadcasts will include important security updates, reminders to update XenForo or key add-ons and promotions.
Allow member count to be sent to Hex servers

If this option is enabled and you have linked your hexthemes.com account your member count will automatically be shared with the hexthemes.com server to verify any subscription you have. If you do not have your hexthemes.com account details stored, your member count will never be automatically sent to hexthemes.com servers.
Skip XML import if add-on version ID is unchanged
Enabling this option will make it quicker to update add-ons if only the files have changed and the XML is the same. Note that if the version ID is 1, the XML will always be imported.
Allow upgrade to unsupported XenForo versions
Checking this option will allow upgrade to versions of XenForo marked as unsupported, such as alpha or beta versions. It is not recommended to select this option on production sites.
Disabling this option will stop suggestions appearing as you type a name of a server file when installing, importing or upgrading a resource.

Enabling this option will allow a XenForo license to be used even if the URL associated with that license does not match the URL of the site. This option should only be used for development sites, as per the XenForo License Agreement.
Always rebuild caches after add-on rebuild
Disabling this option will stop caches from being rebuilt when rebuilding an add-on.
Disabling this option will stop your non-Hex add-ons from being checked for being outdated.
Set default installer for new add-ons to Hex installer
When creating a new add-on in debug mode, this will automatically fill in the install and uninstall boxes with the appropriate methods from the Hex_Install class.
Set default version for new add-ons to 1.0.0 and current timestamp
When creating a new add-on in debug mode, this will automatically fill in the version string and integer fields with 1.0.0 and the current timestamp, respectively.
If entered, imported ZIP files will always be extracted by FTP. We recommend this if the default method causes permission errors.
This is the path to your root directory (the folder which contains the admin.php and index.php files and your js, library and styles directories.
This token will be fetched automatically when you attempt to Upgrade XenForo. It is not required for installing or upgrading anything else.

You can get a license validation token for your XenForo license from the following URL: https://xenforo.com/customers/.
This token will be fetched automatically when you attempt to Upgrade XenForo. It is not required for installing or upgrading anything else.
Never rebuild caches after add-on install

Selecting this option will stop the cache rebuild process after add-ons are installed/upgraded. It is not recommended to select this option as it may mean that add-ons installed are unusable until the cache is rebuilt.
Only show add-ons as outdated if listed on xenforo.com resources section

Enabling this option avoids false positives by only showing add-ons as outdated if they are listed in the resources section on xenforo.com. This does not include paid add-ons or some externally linked add-ons.
Only show add-ons as outdated if they are enabled
Enabling this option removes any disabled add-ons from the list of outdated add-ons.

Enabling this option will allow you to dismiss broadcasts that we consider should never be dismissed. Disabling this option will make the current broadcast visible again if it is undismissable, even if it has been dismissed with this option enabled.
Show last updated date on all broadcasts
Show number of outdated add-ons in admin navigation

Disabling this option will remove the alert balloon showing the number of outdated add-ons in the top navigation next to the 'Home' link and in the side navigation next to the 'Outdated Add-ons' link.
Selecting this option will check the 'save login credentials' option by default when logging in to an external site using this add-on. Stored credentials can be edited here.
Allow add-on upgrade from install page

Selecting this option will allow you to upload an XML or archive file of an add-on that is already installed on the Install Add-on screen and, instead of producing an error, it will upgrade the appropriate add-on.

Selecting this option will allow this add-on to attempt to access any external site using stored credentials first without prompting you to check those credentials. This will enable other admins that don't have the Manage Install and Upgrade Credentials admin permission to install, import and upgrade from external sites without being able to see the stored credentials. Stored credentials can be edited here.
